name: Schedule 15N-Can Blockchain Technology Secure ADS-B Surveillance Data in  Aviation Industry

messages.textToSpeech: How else can I help you?

messages.speech: Blockchain is one of the modern technologies evolving every day and has captured the imagination of companies across industries, including Aviation. The need to protect data in a secure way is of paramount priority in Aviation Industry which aligns perfectly with what Blockchain has to offer. ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillance Broadcast) is the key technology that is mandated by FAA in US by 2020, to maintain safe separation between aircrafts and accommodate more aircrafts within a specified air space at any point in time. However, The question of concern is that the ADS-B data is neither Encrypted nor Authenticated. ADS-B messages can be trivially injected, modified or deleted by an attacker who has full control over the wireless channel. In this session let's take a look at whether it is possible that Blockchain Technology can be used to secure ADS-B applications while still maintaining the transparency of the data.
